message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product for sale. I think you'll really love it!
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do $110, but I was thinking more along the lines of $115. Would you be willing to meet me there?
I'm getting close, but I think I can do $105. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I'm glad we're getting close, Bob! I can do $110, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
